org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.sax

Class FXGSAXScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.sax.FXGSAXScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler

    public class FXGSAXScanner
extends DefaultHandler
    This SAX2 based scanner converts an FXG document (an XML based description of a graphical asset) to a simple object graph to serve as an intermediate representation. The document must be in the FXG 1.0 namespace and the root element must be a <Graphic> tag.
